summary: The story of a rich man, a group of kidnappers, and two friends and a lawyer who got themselves into a series of unexpected twists and turns to finally answer the question; Who killed Bambi?
cast: Quim Gutiérrez|Úrsula Corberó|Belén Ponce de León|Antonio Estrada|Pedro Mari Sánchez|Julián Villagrán|Juan Fran Juárez|Cynthia Martín|José Ángel Egido|Sebastián Haro|Ernesto Alterio|Enrico Vecchi|Manolo Solo|Clara Lago|Juan Carlos Sánchez|José Chaves|Pablo Baena|Juan Motilla|Joaquín Núñez|Carmina Barrios|Paco Moreno|Mari Paz Sayago|Daniel Pérez|Andrés Iniesta|Miguel Tarifa
keywords: lawyer|question in title|sunbathing|underwater scene|slow motion scene
title: ¿Quién mató a Bambi?
